title: attempting to reconnect
body:
every time I start I am in queue, the client pops a message and says attempting to reconnect. then the accept button comes up and i cant press it. after some trials it puts me on a 5 min ban cause i didnt accept queues. My internet is good, cant see why this happens. 
Already tried the hextech repair,  didnt work.

replies.body: Yeah, you can get into a lower priority queue for declining too many matches.  :(  Despite good internet, you can still run into problems reaching specific services.  It sounds like your network is struggling to keep you in the matchmaking you, but the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help.  If possible, test it out in a custom game too to make sure you don't run into issues in-game as well.
